abstract: A man who walked into the office of a newspaper in Schenectady, N.Y., was shot and wounded by police officers after he charged at one with a knife, according to local law enforcement officials.
snippet: A man who walked into the office of a newspaper in Schenectady, N.Y., was shot and wounded by police officers after he charged at one with a knife, according to local law enforcement officials.
lead_paragraph: A man who walked into the office of a newspaper in Schenectady, N.Y., was shot and wounded by police officers on Saturday afternoon after he charged at one with a knife, according to law enforcement officials in the city, which is about 15 miles from Albany.

headline.main: Man With Knife Is Shot by Police at Schenectady Newspaper Office
